question: This state approves Bijepur lift irrigation project recently.
explanation: Odisha government approved the Bijepur lift irrigation project and construction of sewerage system for Bhubaneswar. It was approved in the cabinet meeting chaired by Odisha Chief Minister Naveen Patnaik. The Bijepur lift irrigation project is named after renowned poet Gangadhar Meher. The project is estimated for Rs.1246 crore. It will be completed by March 2018.
